title: Isti'azah
arabic: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ السَّمِيعِ الْعَلِيمِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
translation_ms: Aku berlindung kepada Allah Yang Maha Mendengar lagi Maha Mengetahui daripada syaitan yang direjam
translation_en: I seek refuge in Allah the All-Hearing and All-Knowing from the accursed devil

title: Asbahna/Amsaina – Pembukaan
arabic: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
translation_ms: Kami memasuki pagi atau petang dan kerajaan milik Allah
translation_en: We enter the morning or evening and sovereignty belongs to Allah

title: Asbahna/Amsaina – Tauhid
arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ
translation_ms: Tiada Tuhan selain Allah Yang Esa
translation_en: There is no deity except Allah alone

title: Asbahna/Amsaina – Kekuasaan
arabic: لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
translation_en: To Him belongs sovereignty and praise

title: Doa Kebaikan Hari
arabic: رَبِّ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ مَا فِي هَذَا الْيَوْمِ وَخَيْرَ مَا بَعْدَهُ
translation_en: I ask for the good of this day

title: Doa Perlindungan Hari
arabic: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِي هَذَا الْيَوْمِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهُ
translation_ms: Aku berlindung daripada keburukan hari ini
translation_en: I seek refuge from the evil of this day

title: Doa Kebaikan Malam
arabic: رَبِّ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ مَا فِي هَذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ وَخَيْرَ مَا بَعْدَهَا
translation_en: I ask for the good of this night

title: Doa Perlindungan Malam
arabic: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِي هَذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهَا
translation_ms: Aku berlindung daripada keburukan malam ini
translation_en: I seek refuge from the evil of this night

title: Lindung Malas & Tua
arabic: رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ وَسُوءِ الْكِبَرِ
translation_ms: Aku berlindung dari malas dan buruknya usia tua
translation_en: I seek refuge from laziness and the evils of old age

title: Lindung Azab
arabic: رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ فِي النَّارِ وَعَذَابٍ فِي الْقَبْرِ
translation_ms: Aku berlindung dari azab neraka dan kubur
translation_en: I seek refuge from the punishment of the Fire and the grave

title: Kesejahteraan Badan
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَدَنِي
translation_en: Grant me health in my body

title: Kesejahteraan Pendengaran
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي سَمْعِي
translation_en: Grant me health in my hearing

title: Kesejahteraan Penglihatan
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَصَرِي
translation_en: Grant me health in my sight

title: Lindung Kufur & Fakir
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكُفْرِ وَالْفَقْرِ
translation_ms: Aku berlindung dari kufur dan kemiskinan
translation_en: I seek refuge from disbelief and poverty

title: Lindung Azab Kubur
arabic: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ
translation_en: I seek refuge from the punishment of the grave

title: Tawakkal
arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ
translation_en: Sufficient for me is Allah

title: Fitratul Islam (Pagi)
arabic: أَصْبَحْنَا عَلَىٰ فِطْرَةِ الْإِسْلَامِ وَعَلَىٰ كَلِمَةِ الْإِخْلَاصِ
translation_ms: Kami memasuki pagi di atas fitrah Islam
translation_en: We enter the morning upon the fitrah of Islam

title: Fitratul Islam (Petang)
arabic: أَمْسَيْنَا عَلَىٰ فِطْرَةِ الْإِسْلَامِ وَعَلَىٰ كَلِمَةِ الْإِخْلَاصِ
translation_ms: Kami memasuki petang di atas fitrah Islam
translation_en: We enter the evening upon the fitrah of Islam

title: Sayyidul Istighfar – 1
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
translation_en: You are my Lord

title: Sayyidul Istighfar – 2
arabic: خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ
translation_en: You created me and I am Your servant

title: Sayyidul Istighfar – 3
arabic: فَاغْفِرْ لِي فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
translation_en: So forgive me

title: Istighfar Ringkas
arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ الْعَظِيمَ
translation_en: I seek forgiveness from Allah

title: Selawat Nabi
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَىٰ سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ
translation_en: Blessings upon Prophet Muhammad

title: Tasbih
arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ
translation_en: Glory be to Allah

title: Tahmid
arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
translation_en: All praise is for Allah

title: Takbir
arabic: اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
translation_en: Allah is the Greatest

title: Tahlil
arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ
translation_en: There is no deity except Allah
